column4: guys, In the temrinal i write "inkscape" and this is working but i wanna finish the command or the funtion what is the command? is not exit, quit, q
kill or ctrl + Q don't work the way i think but is not the idea is closing the temrinal
I think, this can't be closed. Hmmmm Any command work
Is you write "inkscape" this open the program but if you close it from the interzafe this close the program with the terminal
I am new men, xD I am seeying how to install programs with the terminal
and sometimes the package name differs from the program name itself
and what i'll do somethimes is sudo apt-get *part of the program* and hit tab to see possibilites, downside is sometimes you get a ton of hits
ex: sudo apt-get install chrom and hit tab, pulls up a bunch of chromium packages
I see, if i put dpkg-query -L package How can i know what is the program to run? Are .exe like Windows?
are you wanting to install a package you dl'd or that is in the repositories?
Look, If i download a program, and i wanna install it from the terminal i write sudo apt-get intall application and the PackAge don't have the name of the program how can i find the executable?
okay i think im finally there with you, this is a .deb file youve downloaded?
No, is just a example i don't have problems with software now
